```suggestion
    const int bucket_count = from_tried ? ADDRMAN_TRIED_BUCKET_COUNT : ADDRMAN_NEW_BUCKET_COUNT;
```

```suggestion
                        RPCResult::Type::ARR, "table", "list of addresses in the address manager table ( new_table, tried_table )",
```

- addressed @brunoerg's review
- included  https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/27511#discussion_r1335084087 as I'm touching the line anyway


I've also been hacking on a tool that visualizes addrman tables from the getaddrmaninfo verbose output in the browser. A wip version is on https://0xb10c.github.io/addrman-observer ([github.com/0xB10C/addrman-observer](https://github.com/0xB10C/addrman-observer)). You can load dumps produced with `bitcoin-cli getaddrmaninfo true > getaddrmaninfo.json` (all processing happens locally).
